p: Similar to our results, the synergistic effect between aromatic compounds has been observed and discussed in a few publications. For example, the binary mixtures of three active constituents (thymol, p-cymene and linalool) of thyme oil in our study were proved to have synergistic toxicity against the third instar larvae of tobacco cutworm [ 42]. Hummelbrunner and Isman examined the synergistic effect of four terpenes on acute toxicity to Spodoptera litura larvae and the most significant synergistic effect was found for the combination of thymol with trans-anethole [ 43].
